message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll take 60 and you can have 40.
You wanted to start with a fair split, but I think I can do better than 40. How about we split it 70-30?

You're trying to meet me halfway, but I think I can still do better. How about we split it 80-20? I'm willing to give you a bit less, but I'm not going to give up much more than that.
I'm not willing to go as low as 20%, but I'm willing to compromise and give you a bit more. How about we split it 40-60?
You're trying to get me to take a smaller share, but I'm not budging. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up most of the money. How about we split it 90-10?
